XmlWorldData.name: Score Tutorial
XmlWorldData.description: This tutorial will show you how to use scores.

value.string: Этот урок покажет тебе, как вести счет в игре.

XmlWorldData.creator: scoy

Step.GamepadText: This tutorial will teach you how to use scores in your game. The world we're starting with has a cycle <cycle>, a tree <tree> and several apples <apple>. The cycle <cycle> is programmed to find all the apples <apple> and eat them. The cycle's <cycle> programming looks like this: :when <sensor.eyes><filter.fruit> do <actuator.movement><selector.towardclosest> :when <sensor.bumpers><filter.fruit> do <actuator.eat> We're going to add a row that makes the cycle <cycle> use a score to keep track of how many apples <apple> are eaten.
Step.MouseText: This tutorial will teach you how to use scores in your game. The world we're starting with has a cycle <cycle>, a tree <tree> and several apples <apple>. The cycle <cycle> is programmed to find all the apples <apple> and eat them. The cycle's <cycle> programming looks like this: :when <sensor.eyes><filter.fruit> do <actuator.movement><selector.towardclosest> :when <sensor.bumpers><filter.fruit> do <actuator.eat> We're going to add a row that makes the cycle <cycle> use a score to keep track of how many apples <apple> are eaten.

value.string: На этом уроке ты научишься начислять очки в своей игре. В мире, с которого мы начнем, находится Байкер <cycle>, дерево <tree> и несколько яблок <apple>. Байкер <cycle> запрограммирован, чтобы находить все яблоки <apple> и есть их. Программа Байкера <cycle> выглядит так: :Когда <sensor.eyes><filter.fruit> Делать <actuator.movement><selector.towardclosest> :Когда <sensor.bumpers><filter.fruit> Делать <actuator.eat> Мы собираемся добавить строчку кода, которая заставит Байкера <cycle> считать, сколько яблок <apple> съедено.

Step.TouchText: This tutorial will teach you how to use scores in your game. The world we're starting with has a cycle <cycle>, a tree <tree> and several apples <apple>. The cycle <cycle> is programmed to find all the apples <apple> and eat them. The cycle's <cycle> programming looks like this: :when <sensor.eyes><filter.fruit> do <actuator.movement><selector.towardclosest> :when <sensor.bumpers><filter.fruit> do <actuator.eat> We're going to add a row that makes the cycle <cycle> use a score to keep track of how many apples <apple> are eaten.

Step.GamepadText:
Right now when the cycle bumps an apple <apple>, the cycle eats it. What we want is to also add a point to the score each time an apple is eaten.
:when <sensor.bumpers><filter.fruit> do <actuator.score><filter.scorebucket.color.red><filter.001point>
Step.MouseText:
Right now when the cycle bumps an apple <apple>, the cycle eats it. What we want is to also add a point to the score each time an apple is eaten.
:when <sensor.bumpers><filter.fruit> do <actuator.score><filter.scorebucket.color.red><filter.001point>

value.string:
Как только Байкер врезается в яблоко <apple>, он есть его. Мы хотим добавлять 1 балл к счету каждый раз, когда яблоко съедено.
:Когда <sensor.bumpers><filter.fruit> Делать <actuator.score><filter.scorebucket.color.red><filter.001point>

Step.TouchText:
Right now when the cycle bumps an apple <apple>, the cycle eats it. What we want is to also add a point to the score each time an apple is eaten.
:when <sensor.bumpers><filter.fruit> do <actuator.score><filter.scorebucket.color.red><filter.001point>

Step.GamepadText: Move to row 3 and add <sensor.bumpers><filter.fruit> do <actuator.score><filter.scorebucket.color.red><filter.001point> The score tile <actuator.score> is in the game group <group.game> red <modifier.scorebucket.color.red> is in the scores group <group.scorebucketmodifiers>
Step.MouseText: Move to row 3 and add <sensor.bumpers><filter.fruit> do <actuator.score><filter.scorebucket.color.red><filter.001point> The score tile <actuator.score> is in the game group <group.game> red <modifier.scorebucket.color.red> is in the scores group <group.scorebucketmodifiers>

value.string: Запиши в 3-ю строчку кода: Когда <sensor.bumpers><filter.fruit> Делать <actuator.score><filter.scorebucket.color.red><filter.001point> Очки <actuator.score> находятся в группе <group.game>. Баллы - группе Баллы.

Step.TouchText: Move to row 3 and add <sensor.bumpers><filter.fruit> do <actuator.score><filter.scorebucket.color.red><filter.001point> The score tile <actuator.score> is in the game group <group.game> red <modifier.scorebucket.color.red> is in the scores group <group.scorebucketmodifiers>

CompletionTest.Name: Kode
CompletionTest.Args: reflex 3 sensor.bumpers filter.fruit actuator.score modifier.scorebucket.color.red modifier.001point

Step.GamepadText: Okay, now we can play the game and see what happens.
Step.MouseText: Okay, now we can play the game and see what happens.

value.string: Oкей, теперь можно запустить игру и посмотреть, что получилось.

Step.TouchText: Okay, now we can play the game and see what happens.

Step.Comment: Now to talk about the tree.
Step.GamepadText:
Okay, the cycle <cycle> ate all the apples <apple> and we kept a count using the red score <filter.scorebucket.color.red>.
Characters can also look at the score values and act on those. Let's program the tree <tree> to end the game when 5 apples <apple> are eaten.
Step.MouseText:
Okay, the cycle <cycle> ate all the apples <apple> and we kept a count using the red score <filter.scorebucket.color.red>.
Characters can also look at the score values and act on those. Let's program the tree <tree> to end the game when 5 apples <apple> are eaten.

value.string:
Байкер <cycle> съел все яблоки <apple>, и мы начислили очки, используя красный счетчик <filter.scorebucket.color.red>.
Персонажи могут также следить за счетом и вести себя в соответствии с его значением. Давайте запрограммируем дерево <tree>, чтобы игра заканчивалась, когда будет съедено 5 яблок <apple>.

Step.TouchText:
Okay, the cycle <cycle> ate all the apples <apple> and we kept a count using the red score <filter.scorebucket.color.red>.
Characters can also look at the score values and act on those. Let's program the tree <tree> to end the game when 5 apples <apple> are eaten.

Step.GamepadText: The program should look like this: :when <sensor.scored><filter.scorebucket.color.red><filter.scoreequals><filter.005points> do <actuator.gameover> The game over tile <actuator.gameover> can be found in the game group <group.game>.
Step.MouseText: The program should look like this: :when <sensor.scored><filter.scorebucket.color.red><filter.scoreequals><filter.005points> do <actuator.gameover> The game over tile <actuator.gameover> can be found in the game group <group.game>.

value.string: Программа должна выглядеть так: :Когда <sensor.scored><filter.scorebucket.color.red><filter.scoreequals><filter.005points> Делать <actuator.gameover> Карточку <actuator.gameover> можно найти в группе Игра <group.game>.

Step.TouchText: The program should look like this: :when <sensor.scored><filter.scorebucket.color.red><filter.scoreequals><filter.005points> do <actuator.gameover> The game over tile <actuator.gameover> can be found in the game group <group.game>.

Step.GamepadText: Okay, now we can play the game again and see what happens.
Step.MouseText: Okay, now we can play the game again and see what happens.

value.string: Oкей, теперь можно запустить игру и посмотреть, что получилось.

Step.TouchText: Okay, now we can play the game again and see what happens.

Step.Comment: Run the game, wait until only 2 apples remain

Step.GamepadText: Good job! In this tutorial we've learned to use scores to count apples <apple> and then use that count to end the game. This is just the beginning of what scores can be used for. What ideas can you come up with?
Step.MouseText: Good job! In this tutorial we've learned to use scores to count apples <apple> and then use that count to end the game. This is just the beginning of what scores can be used for. What ideas can you come up with?

value.string: Отличная работа! В этом уроке мы научились добавлять баллы, чтобы считать съеденные яблоки <apple>, и затем использовать количество очков для завершения игры. Это только один вариант, как использовать начисленные баллы. А у тебя какие идеи, для чего еще можно использовать начисление баллов?

Step.TouchText: Good job! In this tutorial we've learned to use scores to count apples <apple> and then use that count to end the game. This is just the beginning of what scores can be used for. What ideas can you come up with?
